title: 148863538.your Best Work
excerpt: It’s entirely possible that your best work isn’t what you get paid to do.

children.text: It’s entirely possible that your best work isn’t what you get paid to do.
Or, even something you do while at work.
While it’s true that you need to love what you do to do work you're proud of—being
to do it is no prerequisite for having discovered your best way to make an impact.
In other words: how we choose to make a difference doesn’t have to always be what pays the bills.
